summary: This bill, the Closing the De Minimis Loophole Act, aims to eliminate the de minimis exemption under the Tariff Act of 1930, which allows for duty-free entry of certain low-value goods. It outlines a phased approach, with stricter enforcement for goods from China, and mandates rulemaking by the Secretary of the Treasury to ensure consistent implementation, proper data collection, and deter fraudulent activities. It also addresses international postal shipments.
